Models: First Difference Hierarchical

Source: vignettes/articles/models_first_diff_hier.Rmd
models_first_diff_hier.Rmd

Data prep

Load packages 

library(bbsBayes2)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)

Stratify 

s <- stratify(by = "bbs_cws", sample = TRUE)
#> Using 'bbs_cws' (standard) stratification
#> Using sample BBS data...
#> Using species Pacific Wren (sample data)
#> Stratifying data...
#>   Combining BCR 7 and NS and PEI...
#>   Renaming routes...

Prepare counts 

p <- prepare_data(s, min_max_route_years = 2)

Prepare model 

md <- prepare_model(p, model = "first_diff", model_variant = "hier")

Run model 

m <- run_model(md, iter_sampling = 10, iter_warmup = 10, chains = 2)
#> One set of `init` values supplied, duplicating for each chain.
#> Compiling Stan program...

Explore results

Convergence 

conv <- get_convergence(m)
conv
#> # A tibble: 10,495 × 5
#>    variable_type variable       rhat ess_bulk ess_tail
#>    <chr>         <chr>         <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>
#>  1 lp__          lp__          2.25        10       10
#>  2 strata_raw    strata_raw[1] 1.07        10       10
#>  3 strata_raw    strata_raw[2] 1.37        10       10
#>  4 strata_raw    strata_raw[3] 0.937       10       10
#>  5 strata_raw    strata_raw[4] 1.52        10       10

#>  7 strata_raw    strata_raw[6] 1.23        10       10

#>  9 strata_raw    strata_raw[8] 1.29        10       10
#> 10 strata_raw    strata_raw[9] 1.35        10       10
#> # … with 10,485 more rows

Indices 

i <- generate_indices(model_output = m,
                      regions = c("continent",
                                  "country",
                                  "prov_state",
                                  "stratum"))
#> Processing region continent
#> Processing region country
#> Processing region prov_state
#> Processing region stratum

p <- plot_indices(i, add_observed_means = TRUE)
patchwork::wrap_plots(p, ncol = 3)

Trends 

t <- generate_trends(indices = i)
plot_map(trends = t)

Geofacet plots 

plot_geofacet(indices = i, trends = t)

Reproducibility and Clean up 

list.files(pattern = "csv|rds")
#> [1] "BBS_STAN_first_diff_hier_2023-01-17-1.csv" "BBS_STAN_first_diff_hier_2023-01-17-2.csv"
#> [3] "BBS_STAN_first_diff_hier_2023-01-17.rds"
unlink(list.files(pattern = "csv|rds"))
